commit.message:
PkgManager: Add --usepkg=n to portage arguments

ask emerge to "--usepkg=n" to avoid reinstalling broken binaries

Closes: https://github.com/gentoo-haskell/haskell-updater/pull/22
Signed-off-by: hololeap <hololeap@protonmail.com>

commit.message:
Allow for old versions of bytestring

BS.dropEnd requires >=bytestring-0.11.1, but this doesn't get bundled
with GHC until v9.2.1. Allow for old bytestring/behavior so that
previous versions of GHC can still use haskell-updater.

Signed-off-by: hololeap <hololeap@users.noreply.github.com>

verification.payload:
tree fd39ef3d8b60eea92db7da5a65cff4ba23d58968
parent c6a28ffd39c0e004245387a0ee6f32c803d6aaa0
author hololeap <hololeap@users.noreply.github.com> 1690054227 -0600
committer hololeap <hololeap@users.noreply.github.com> 1690054593 -0600

Allow for old versions of bytestring

BS.dropEnd requires >=bytestring-0.11.1, but this doesn't get bundled
with GHC until v9.2.1. Allow for old bytestring/behavior so that
previous versions of GHC can still use haskell-updater.

Signed-off-by: hololeap <hololeap@users.noreply.github.com>

commit.message:
Swap getDirectoryContents' for listDirectory

Modern directory has a function that makes getDirectoryContents'
redundant.
